title: My smurfs are higher ranked than my main

replies.body: The big pile of free MMR you get for being new, in the expectation you will either waste it horribly or actually climb faster if smurfing.

hmm your smurfs had a fresh mmr. and you climb faster being a smurf therefore you have a higher mmr. 

when on your main all that crap you did learning the game trying to climb tanked the over all mmr.
By having to win rank games and climbing. EZ
